attributes.action: Ensure that the latest Air Passenger Duty, (APD) surcharge, imposed by Chancellor, G Brown, is indeed used to the good of protection for the enviroment against global warming, eg supporting investment in offshore green power generation, rather than just put into the Chancellor's general funds.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Chancellor imposed this APD in Dec 2006, but nobody seems to have any knowledge to what enviroment project or projects, this is going to be used for. It seems that this is yet another general taxation policy.
